article: dubai is undoubtedly one of the best global cities to celebrate new year 2018 . the city spoils you with the choice of partying , dining and anything that is exotic and will blow your mind . while boasting a cornucopia dubai goes out of the way to keep up with the promise to the visitors for an outstanding new year 's eve celebration . are you confused on how to bring in to the new year 2018 ? right from the spectacular fireworks to the late night parties , fabulous dining and exciting celebrations stretched till early hours of 2018 , we have listed a guide for you that will inspire you to make new year 's eve 2018 in dubai all the more fun and memorable .

with the plentiful options on flights and accommodations in dubai your new year will worth flying to this magical land . the spectacular fireworksbring in the new year with a picturesque backdrop of magnificent fireworks been displayed at famous spots that will surely give you an experience of a lifetime . the moment the clock strikes 12 in the midnight the world 's biggest firework show will be displayed for the world . new year 2018 fireworks at burj khalifa : fireworks at burj khalifa is the most famous and probably world 's biggest man-made structure . the fireworks at burj khalifa is can be conveniently viewed from anywhere in the downtown and other parts of the city .

just after the fireworks followed by the fountain show you can wait for the lightup2018 lined up by emaar . fireworks at burj al arab : burj al arab is a perfect backdrop to bring in the new year with enchanting fireworks . the sail-shaped spot is the only seven-star hotel . grab a perfect spot near kite beach or jumeirah beach or madinat jumeirah to witness the fireworks at the best point . fireworks at atlantis : atlantis , the palm is another spectacular spot in dubai to witness fireworks splendor . to enjoy the evening that extends till early hours of 2018 you can book special new year 's eve royal gala under the stars .

make sure you reach your spot much ahead of time to see the spectacular fireworks . as they will be occupied on first come first serve basis . new year 2018 at the desertif you are not fond of all the hustle bustle that happens during the new year then an escape to the most serene even of 2018 is the spending the evening in the arabian desert . you can book your package and set out a bedouin-style campsite . here you can experience warm arabian hospitality with appetizing bbq , unlimited refreshment , engage in other exciting activities including camel ride , henna painting , dune bashing , belly dancing and a lot more .

you have the chance to sip in your favorite drink and have thrilling overnight stay in the desert under the sparkling stars . board a traditional dhowif you are spending your new year with a special person then boarding a traditional dhow makes a perfect intimate ambiance for both of you to start the new year . a dazzling combination of great good , entertainment , personalized service will make your experience all the more fun and frolic . sailing over dubai marina and dubai creek is a stunning sight . the multi-cuisine buffet dinner and champagne toast during the midnight to bring in the new year 2018 will be a beautiful memory .

while sailing be in awe as you see the city skyline and the majestic fireworks been displayed at various places from the middle of the water as the new year 's eve comes to an end with memories you will cherish for years . enjoy dubai shopping festival 2018just when you have celebrated the new year 's eve you have the chance to continue the festivities in dubai by getting onto the shopping spree . it is known as the most awaited event of the year which will be kicking off from december 26th , 2017 until 34 days .

dubai shopping festival 2018 comprises of series of events including fashion shows , fireworks displays , mega sales , delectable multi cuisines . we hope these ideas will help you select the best to welcome the new year 2018 in the most enthralling way ! so grab your best deals for new year 2018 on flights and hotels in the most alluring way in dubai . here is wishing you all an incredible year ahead from alkamilbooking . com !
